scripts.usemin: node_modules/usemin-cli/bin/usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html && node_modules/usemin-cli/bin/usemin acerca.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/acerca.html && node_modules/usemin-cli/bin/usemin contacto.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/contacto.html && node_modules/usemin-cli/bin/usemin productos.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/productos.html
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run scss && npm run imagemin && npm run usemin
